boardgame.name: Firkaland
Loony Quest
Szalona Misja
怪物仙境
boardgame.description: In the wonderful land of Arkadia, a very old king has no heir. He organizes a tournament to offer his throne to the bravest adventurer of the kingdom. Up to five finalists will wander seven worlds full of surprises..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the drawing game Loony Quest, players study challenging level cards, then try to replicate the outline to meet targets and avoid obstacles on their tracing sheets. Once finished, players place their sheets on top of the level card to see whether the drawings line up with the targets they meant to hit _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; or avoid. Largely inspired by video games, Loony Quest players discover various worlds, play with 3D and 2D levels, run into loony monsters _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Loonies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and big bosses, trigger special stages, collect bonuses, use penalties on opponents, and gather as many Xperience points as possible to win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Loony Quest features the same basic gameplay as in Doodle Quest, but has been developed differently by the publisher._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
